adapter not ready: Der Adapter läuft nicht oder ist noch nicht bereit!
At least one must be granted or the key: At least one must be granted or the key exchange will be canceled.
At least one network key is not yet conf: At least one network key is not yet configured. This can cause problems during secure inclusion.
clear cache procedure: Der Adapter startet neu und interviewt alle Knoten erneut. Dies kann sehr lange dauern und einige Knoten funktionieren in der Zwischenzeit nicht wie erwartet.
Communicating with the device, please be: Communicating with the device, please be patient...
config update disclaimer: WARNUNG: Dies ist ein experimentelles Feature. Bitte vor der Nutzung ein ioBroker-Backup erstellen!
Configure the region and radio frequenci: Configure the region and radio frequencies of the controller.
Do you really want to remove this node f: Do you really want to remove this node from the network?
Do you really want to replace this node?: Do you really want to replace this node?
firmware update no wait time: Das Gerät wird jetzt neu interviewt.
firmware update wait time: Das Gerät wird in {0} Sekunden neu interviewt.
firmware update wake up: Eventuell müssen Sie es erneut aufwecken.
firmware update warning: WARNUNG: Benutzung auf eigene Gefahr! Wir übernehmen keine Verantwortung, wenn Ihre Geräte nach einem Update nicht funktionieren.
For devices without a DSK. Authenticatio: For devices without a DSK. Authentication of the inclusion happens on the device instead of in ioBroker.
Forget all information about all nodes a: Forget all information about all nodes and re-interview them. Battery-powered nodes might need to be woken up manually.
hosted port tip: Um einen gehosteten seriellen Port zu nutzen, einfach mittels 'tcp://hostname:port' verbinden.
Invalid network key: Ungültiger Netzwerkschlüssel: Muss 16 Byte lang sein (32 hexadezimale Zeichen [0-9, a-f])
Legacy door locks without S2 support: Legacy door locks without S2 support
Like S2 Authenticated, but without verif: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included
Name: Name
network key confirm: Der vorhandene Schlüssel wird überschrieben, weshalb der Adapter nicht mehr mit bereits eingebundenen sicheren Geräten kommunizieren kann. Möchten Sie fortfahren?
network key tooltip: 16 bytes in hexadezimaler Form (32 Zeichen 0-9, a-f). Ohne Leerzeichen, ohne Komma, ohne führende '0x'.
Node %s was removed from the network!: Node %s was removed from the network!
Note: Applying a different region might: Note: Applying a different region might take a few seconds.
Only use S0, even if S2 is available. Al: Only use S0, even if S2 is available. Allows including devices that require security but don't behave correctly during S2 inclusion.
Please choose which of the following sec: Please choose which of the following security classes to grant to the new node.
Please enter the 5-digit PIN for your de: Please enter the 5-digit PIN for your device and verify that the rest of the device-specific key (DSK) matches the one on your device or the manual.
Put your device into exclusion mode: Put your device into exclusion mode
Put your device into inclusion mode: Put your device into inclusion mode
Remove this node from the network.
Replace this node with a different one,: Replace this node with a different one, keeping the node ID.
Requires user interaction during the inc: Requires user interaction during the inclusion.
secure, but slow due to a lot of overhea: secure, but slow due to a lot of overhead
Security S2 when supported, Security S0: Security S2 when supported, Security S0 as a fallback, no encryption otherwise.
Security S2 when supported, Security S0 only when necessary, no encryption otherwise.
Select the correct region for where you: Select the correct region for where you are. Using a different region may be illegal.
switch compat tooltip: Überschreibt den Status 'targetValue' von Binary und Multilevel Switches mit 'currentValue', um die Werte synchron zu halten
The device is now being interviewed. It: The device is now being interviewed. It might take a while to show up.
This should only be set for debugging pu: Dies sollte nur zu Debugging-Zwecken aktiviert werden.
WARNING: Make sure that the node is rese: WARNING: Make sure that the node is reset before attempting this.
WARNING: Only do this if you no longer h: WARNING: Only do this if you no longer have physical access.
Wipes all configuration of the controlle: Wipes all configuration of the controller. All connected nodes will be orphaned and have to be reset and included into the new network before they can be used again.
Z-Wave supports the following security m: Z-Wave supports the following security mechanisms:
